column1: 2451,Amazing Spider-Man (1999) #524,524,71057,25,"""ACTS OF AGGRESSION"" What horrors do the hordes of Hydra hold in store for the sensational Spider-Man and his teammates?   Will the web-head and the New Avengers stop the revitalized Hydra from bringing the United States to its knees...? And if so...at what cost? The pulse-pounding conclusion to the Hydra arc!",
